thread.title: BRIEF-Telling Telecommunication Holding unit signs cooperation agreement with Prosperous Glory Investment

title: BRIEF-Telling Telecommunication Holding unit signs cooperation agreement with Prosperous Glory Investment

organizations.name: reuters) - telling telecommunication holding co ltd

text:
Feb 5(Reuters) - Telling Telecommunication Holding Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s Shenzhen-based wholly owned unit signs cooperation agreement with Prosperous Glory Investment Holdings Limited on lottery business in Nigeria
